bike.description: Cr-Mo main frame jumping frame, No Oval head tube, integrated rotor plate, X-Wire brake routing, 6mm D.O.

components.description: Specialized 2 piece, 195mm rise x 620 width, 9 deg back sweep, 3 deg up sweep
Front: Rush single pivot caliper, Rear: Tektro U-Brake
Specialized 44t alloy solid disc type with CNC center/drive hole and teeth
Heat treated Cro-Mo 8 spline 19mm spindle, sealed loose ball bearings
Alloy platform, 9/16 spindle" Cro-Mo spindle, molded pins
36 hole, loose ball, alloy shell, solid 14mm Cro-Mo axle
36 hole, "Flip Side" (right and left F/W thread), loose ball, alloy shell, solid 14mm Cro-Mo axle
14g UCP with brass nipples (Front: L189/R189mm Rear: L185/R185mm)
Specialized Jumping with 8mm rails and X-brace
Forged alloy single bolt design 33.3 x 31.3mm
Specialized alloy fork cap, 38mm OD alloy chain tensioners, chainguard cover, reflectors, owners manual
